items.title: About Me
items.summary: I'm working on the analysis of the terminal structures and alteration phenomenon of the dsRNA alternavirus genomes. In the future, I will identify the protein functions of the alternavirus, and screen mycoviruses in Rhizoctonia solani strains collected from Taiwan. ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 2019 - Present Ph.D.,…
